ADLT#3:2_0.sentence: This establishment is the real deal.

BFC#7:11_0.sentence: Considering you will spend at least $60 a head, I expect better service.

BFC#7:3_0.sentence: Each time we've been, the front of house staff (not the waiters - they're fantastic - but the people who greet and seat you) has been so hideous to us that were it not for the exceptional fish dishes I would never return.

BFC#7:8_0.sentence: There's another girl who I can't describe, she is about 5'6" with brown hair, who eavesdrops on your conversation and chimes in - except she only hears the last part of what you said, so her uninvited opinions are often out of context and nothing to do with what you're *really* talking about.

Z#6:14_0.sentence: I don’t usually visit the same establishment more than once, what more twice, but I’ll come to Zenkichi anytime for a quiet, unhurried and memorable dinner.

Z#6:2_0.sentence: Not only is it an adventure getting to this somewhat hidden spot, once you enter the unmarked wooden doors, the zen and intimate décor will make you feel like you’re no longer in the city.

Z#6:2_1.sentence: Not only is it an adventure getting to this somewhat hidden spot, once you enter the unmarked wooden doors, the zen and intimate décor will make you feel like you’re no longer in the city.

Z#6:2_2.sentence: Not only is it an adventure getting to this somewhat hidden spot, once you enter the unmarked wooden doors, the zen and intimate décor will make you feel like you’re no longer in the city.

Z#6:3_0.sentence: If you’re planning to come here, make sure that your date is someone whom you really like since you’ll be ushered to private booths where there will be no people or food watching (choose the ones on the ground level that have glass ceilings so you may see the stars in the sky!).

Z#6:7_0.sentence: We started off with a delightful sashimi amuse bouche.

Z#6:9_0.sentence: I picked the Grilled Black Cod as my entree, which I absolutely devoured while someone commented that the Grilled Salmon dish was better.

Z#7:0_0.sentence: This place doesn't make any sense

Z#7:2_0.sentence: This place has totally weird decor, stairs going up with mirrored walls - I am surprised how no one yet broke their head or fall off the stairs - mirrored walls make you dizzy and delusional...

Z#7:3_0.sentence: This place is not inviting and the food is totally weird.

Z#7:4_0.sentence: The concept of japanese tapas is newly created and clearly doesn't work.

Z#7:5_0.sentence: The food they serve is not comforting, not appetizing and uncooked.

Z#9:1_0.sentence: The boths are not as small as some of the reviews make them out to look they're perfect for 2 people.

Z#9:2_1.sentence: The service was extremely fast and attentive(thanks to the service button on your table) but I barely understood 1 word when the waiter took our order.

Z#9:3_0.sentence: The food was ok and fair nothing to go crazy.

Z#9:5_0.sentence: Over all the looks of the place exceeds the actual meals.

Z#9:6_0.sentence: So what you really end up paying for is the restaurant not the food.
